backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and comparison helpers for users, tasks, audit logs, and overtime entries within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records with associated files, components, tests, and metadata for dark mode and language‑default updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes including layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Timestamp marker used to force rebuilds and track build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component handling authentication, profile setup, role-based routing, and theme provider wrapping.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload option on uncaught errors.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Manager-only detail view showing an assistant’s overtime data, charts, CSV export, and task habit metrics.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Displays a scrollable list of assistants with selection handling and shows each assistant’s overtime totals fetched via a query.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with branding, user info, theme toggle, and logout action.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Computes overtime totals for assistants and renders summary rows and bar charts for team-wide analytics.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a cumulative overtime trend chart (line or bar) by transforming overtime entries into date‑grouped chart data.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Provides a form to submit overtime additions or deductions with validation and date formatting before sending to the backend.
Shows a searchable, paginated overtime entry table with formatted dates and minute breakdowns.
Displays overtime totals with loading skeletons and formatted days, hours, and minutes.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Wraps NextThemesProvider to supply theme context to the app.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Renders a searchable and filterable audit log of task actions with error handling and sorting.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Shows a dialog displaying a full-size preview of an evidence image for a task.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Provides a dialog for marking tasks done with optional comments and image uploads including validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Displays a task’s action history in a dialog with timestamps and optional evidence image previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Allows selecting an assistant and viewing or updating their task preferences with icons and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main to-do section component handling task CRUD, filtering, sorting, dialogs, and query mutations.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders a task table with urgency indicators, actions, and history/image previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Dialog for creating or editing tasks with validation and optional delete confirmation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, loading stored identities, and exposing authentication methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, overtime, assistants, and to-do task operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑dos and overtime, fetching and logging overtime entries.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides manager views for to‑dos, team management, analytics, and audit logs with assistant data controls.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Allows new assistants to set a username and language, submitting registration via mutation.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Exports a helper that returns a CSS class based on whether overtime is added or used.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Provides utilities for task completion metrics, formatting history, timestamps, and preference labels/colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides helper functions for computing next due dates, urgency scores, and display labels for recurring tasks using workday-based rules and Monday-based rollovers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing them from the URL without reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Captures the app’s current project state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature definitions for planning and migration tracking.
